PyInstaller

[:python_version <= "3.9" and sys_platform == "darwin" and platform_machine == "arm64"]
numpy==1.21.0

[:python_version <= "3.9" and sys_platform == "linux" and platform_machine == "aarch64"]
numpy==1.19.3

[:python_version == "3.6" and platform_machine != "aarch64" and platform_machine != "arm64"]
numpy==1.13.3

[:python_version == "3.7" and platform_machine != "aarch64" and platform_machine != "arm64"]
numpy==1.14.5

[:python_version == "3.8" and platform_machine != "aarch64" and platform_machine != "arm64"]
numpy==1.17.3

[:python_version == "3.9" and platform_machine != "aarch64" and platform_machine != "arm64"]
numpy==1.19.3

[:python_version >= "3.10"]
numpy==1.22.3

[:sys_platform != "linux" or platform_machine != "i686"]
opencv-python==4.5.5.64

[:sys_platform == "linux" and platform_machine == "i686"]
opencv_python==4.5.1.48
